resources.string: For downloading photo from Narrative Service, Authentication is required. Click and authorize this application.
Enable to synchronized on cellular network.
Enable to download to local storage. Turing on is not recommended, cellular phone storage volume is not so large.
Token of Narrative service is already expired. Please authenticate again on Narrative Service.
For using this application, more than 1GB free space is needed.

Enable to synchronized to google photo of specified google account. If you enable this option and turn off downloading to local storage, photo data will be uploaded to Google Photo and not be stored on local storage (except data cache). If you enable downloading to local storage, you do not need to enable this option, Android will automatically upload to Google Photo of your account.
For uploading photo to google photo, Authenticating google account is needed.
Enable to resynchronized to network attached storage.
[Notice] While charging battery only , synchronization service will be executed
"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
